ygData.subject: An Introduction...
ygData.msgSnippet: Well met fellow travlers, I seek only to introduce my self to thoes that come to this place to converse and share in their experances. I am a Half-Elf Bard of
ygData.messageBody:
Well met fellow travlers, I seek only to introduce my self to thoes that
come to this place to converse and share in their experances. I am a
Half-Elf Bard of 5th level in the town of Freeport. My name is SnowLynx,
and while still young in my travles I seek to learn much of the world of
Norrath. I have seen much of the city of Freeport and the east commons, I
would admit my visit to the sewers of Freeport was not the most glamourous
of adventures, but it was intresting. I seek others of my traid to share
experances and information that I/they have gathered while exploring the
realm.

In hopes of hearring from you soon...

SnowLynx, Gentelman Bard of Freeport...
